001
002package com.commercetools.monitoring.newrelic;
003
004import java.util.Optional;
005import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
006import java.util.function.Function;
007
008import com.newrelic.api.agent.*;
009
010import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpRequest;
011import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpResponse;
012import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ContextApiHttpClientImpl;
013import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.TelemetryMiddleware;
014
015/**
016 * <p>The NewRelicTelemetry middleware can be used to report outgoing request to commercetools to NewRelic.
017 * It can be registered as TelemetryMiddleware to the {@link io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ClientBuilder#withTelemetryMiddleware(TelemetryMiddleware) ClientBuilder}
018 * or the ApiRootBuilder.</p>
019 *
020 * {@include.example example.ApiRootBuilderTest#addNewRelic()}
021 *
022 * <p>The middleware reads the {@link NewRelicContext} from the Request and restores the transaction using a {@link Token}
023 * The details of the request and response are then reported as {@link Segment} with {@link HttpParameters}</p>
024 *
025 * <p>The Context has to be attached in your application either to a {@link io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ContextApiHttpClient}
026 * or the {@link ApiHttpRequest#addContext(Object) Request} itself.</p>
027 *
028 * {@include.example example.ApiRootBuilderTest#contextClient()}
029 *
030 * {@include.example example.ApiRootBuilderTest#contextApiRoot()}
031 *
032 * The {@link NewRelicContextImpl} will {@link Token#expire() expire} the {@link Token} when it's closed. Closing a {@link io.vrap.rmf.base.client.Context}
033 * is ensured by {@link ContextApiHttpClientImpl#close() ContextApiHttpClient} if it's implementing {@link java.io.Closeable}
034 *
035 * See also the Spring MVC example application in the examples folder for further details.
036 */
037public class NewRelicTelemetryMiddleware implements TelemetryMiddleware {
038    @Trace(async = true)
039    @Override
040    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> invoke(ApiHttpRequest request,
041            Function<ApiHttpRequest, CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>>> next) {
042
043        Optional<NewRelicContext> context = Optional.ofNullable(request.getContext(NewRelicContext.class));
044        context.map(NewRelicContext::getToken).ifPresent(Token::link);
045        Optional<Token> token = context.map(NewRelicContext::getTransaction).map(Transaction::getToken);
046        Optional<Segment> segment = context.map(c -> c.getTransaction()
047                .startSegment("commercetools", request.getMethod() + " " + request.getUri().getPath()));
048        return next.apply(request).thenApply(response -> {
049            token.ifPresent(Token::linkAndExpire);
050            segment.ifPresent(s -> s.reportAsExternal(HttpParameters.library("commercetools-sdk-java-v2")
051                    .uri(request.getUri())
052                    .procedure(request.getMethod().name())
053                    .noInboundHeaders()
054                    .status(response.getStatusCode(), response.getMessage())
055                    .build()));
056            segment.ifPresent(Segment::end);
057            return response;
058        });
059    }
060}
